name: RacoldNet
0:
”Alexa, raise the temperature of the water heater.”
”Alexa, what is the temperature of the water heater?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Racold NET is the skill that makes your product smart thanks to remote temperature management, consumption optimisation and constant monitoring of the product's operating status.
Now you can enhance your experience with voice control to manage your product and create a smart home with the Amazon Alexa app.
To get started, select "Enable to use," connect your Racold account* and start searching for your water heater. After connecting Alexa to your Racold product, try giving some commands** such as: "Alexa, raise the temperature of the water heater" or "Alexa, what is the temperature of the water heater?"
*To connect Alexa to Racold NET, you must use the Racold NET account, which is the account you created and used to control your Racold connected product.
**When using this Skill, you must specify the name of the water heater. You can set it directly within the Alexa app.
